{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=AiCam |revision=2 (v2) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=12/22/2017 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=new |type=wireless camera |fcc_id= |pcb_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=micro USB |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= <!-- 720p Image Sensor Module;OmniVision;OV9712;;1; ,,, 1080p 30fps H.264 Camera Codec with HDR ISP;GEO Semiconductor;MAX64380;;1; ,,, 16-Bit Mono Audio Voice Codec;Maxim;MAX9860;;1; ,,, Mono 2.6W Class D Audio Power Amplifier;Maxim;MAX98300;;1; --> |flags=IR LED, microphone, speaker |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=AC:22:0B |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Smart Cloud NightView Camera}} :[https://www.asus.com/Networking/AiCam-2/ Product Page] {{•}} [https://www.asus.com/supportonly/AiCam/HelpDesk_Download/ Support page]
===Overview=== <small> *'''Color images at night''' - AiCam NightView, utilizing a Sony image sensor and video :processor, takes home monitoring to a new level with low-light performance :producing natural-color recordings for easy identification of visitors *'''High-quality images in challenging conditions''' - Wide Dynamic Range (WDR) :technology handles several different lighting conditions, including backlight :and high-contrast scenes, to produce clear, highly detailed footage *'''Safe and free storage for recordings''' - Record video directly to ASUS Cloud Storage :or an SD card to keep recordings safe from physical damage or hardware failure *'''Choose where to keep a watchful eye''' - Keep track of what’s happening at home :with selectable motion detection zones and instant mobile notifications *'''Two-way audio''' - Integrated high-quality speaker and mic support simultaneous :two-way audio for natural conversations </small>
===Specifications=== *Network Standard: 802.11abgn/ac, IPv4, IPv6 *Features: Digital Zoom: 4x, Min Illumination: 0.1 lux :Image sensor: Sony, Size: 1/2.8", Resolution: 2 MP :Aperture: F 1.85, Focal length: 2.3 mm :Resolution: Sensor: 1920 x 1080, Video: 30fps / 1080p :Field of View (H/V/D): 128° / 72° / 147° :Compression: Video: H.264 / MPEG4 / MJPEG, Audio: AAC *Capacity: Cloud storage, Micro SD card (up to 64 GB) *Power Supply: :AC Input : 110~240V (50~60Hz) :DC Output : 5V with max. 2A current
===See also=== *[[ASUS AiCam]] - ''Smart Cloud NightView Camera'' • [https://www.unifore.net/ip-video-surveillance/asus-aicam-alternative-d1000-smart-wifi-ip-camera.html PR] *[[ASUS AiCam 2]] - ''Smart Cloud NightView Camera'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/AiCam-2/ PPage] *[[ASUS HG100]] - ''Smart Home Gateway'' • [http://armdevices.net/2016/02/18/asus-hg100-rk3066-smart-home-gateway-via-zigbeewifi-bluetooth/ PR] • [https://mysmahome.com/news/4305/asus-debuts-smart-home-series-using-zigbee-2/ PR] • [https://mysmahome.com/product/6285/product-introduction-asus-smart-home-gateway-hg100/ PR] • [https://www.asus.com/sg/Internet-of-Things/ASUS-SmartHome-Gateway-HG100/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RK903 MSQ-RK903] (2015-04-02), CPU: ''Rockchip'' RK3066 @1.5GHz :Flash/RAM: 8/1GB, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, ZigBee, HDMI 2.0 (4K H.265) *ASUS Reco Classic Dash Cam (Full HD 1080p) - B0105TLZB8 *ASUS Reco Smart Dash Cam & Portable Cam - B075GHGNGX *[[ASUS Zenbo]] - ''Home Robot'' • [http://hexus.net/tech/items/laptop/106402-asus-showcases-new-consumer-lifestyle-products-computex-2017/ Computex 2017 PR] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-ZENBO MSQ-ZENBO] (2017-07-27)
